ygData.subject: Second resist message.
ygData.msgSnippet: Was fighting casters last night and noticed that they have added a message for the second resist on pixie strike.  It now says something like, yada yada
ygData.messageBody:
Was fighting casters last night and noticed that
they have added a message for the second resist on
pixie strike. It now says something like, "yada
yada resists your attempt to mezmerise them." It
looks like a total hack, however, as you STILL get
the "So and so's eyes glaze over." In addition,
this second resist message is in BLUE, so it's
very hard to see. Haven't these guys ever heard
the phrase that it's better to take the time to do
it right than to have to do it over?

Laluni Songhammer of E'Ci.

--
Steven S. Klug
sklug@...
